overview: During a typically disaster-filled day, Ben Harris, an angry and frustrated bachelor mailman living in a cluttered Greenwich Village basement, learns he has been paying rent to a woman who hasn't owned his building in 6 years. No longer able to endure the injustices of society, he decides to activate the ferocious tiger within himself by abducting a helpless female and dragging her back to his lair.
tagline: It's all about a Greenwich Village cat on the make ... ... who ends up with Gloria, the housewife, by mistake!
title: The Tiger Makes Out
